title: ROS topic communication not working OCU -> field

content.raw:
I'm unable to receive msgs from rostopic using a publisher in OCU and a listener in field1. Not blocked by bytecounter.

Steps in OCU
```
jrivero@quartz ~ $ export ROS_MASTER_URI=http://10.0.0.51:11311
jrivero@quartz ~ $ rostopic pub -r 10 /test std_msgs/Int8 12
```
Steps in field1
```
ubuntu@fc1-03:~$ . cloudsim/ros.bash
ubuntu@fc1-03:~$ rostopic info /test
Type: std_msgs/Int8

Publishers: 
 * /rostopic_5156_1369232420033 (http://quartz:35320/)

Subscribers: None

ubuntu@fc1-03:~$ rostopic echo /test
WARNING: no messages received and simulated time is active.
Is /clock being published?
```
It could be a problem in my end, but I want to be sure about this issue.

I'm unable to receive msgs from rostopic using a publisher in OCU and a listener in field1. Not blocked by bytecounter.

Steps in OCU

jrivero@quartz ~ $ export ROS_MASTER_URI=http://10.0.0.51:11311
jrivero@quartz ~ $ rostopic pub -r 10 /test std_msgs/Int8 12

Steps in field1

ubuntu@fc1-03:~$ . cloudsim/ros.bash
ubuntu@fc1-03:~$ rostopic info /test
Type: std_msgs/Int8

Publishers: 
 * /rostopic_5156_1369232420033 (http://quartz:35320/)

Subscribers: None

ubuntu@fc1-03:~$ rostopic echo /test
WARNING: no messages received and simulated time is active.
Is /clock being published?

It could be a problem in my end, but I want to be sure about this issue.
